ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Where to put property file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Michael, You are right. I am using java.util.ResourceBundle to read in the jdbc properties.I name my property file with locale suffix (.en).I have put

Hello Michael,
You are right. I am using java.util.ResourceBundle to
read in the jdbc properties.I name my property file
with locale suffix (.en).I have put class files
(DBJdbc .class and SQLWriter.class) and property file
into the directory
org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer.Do i need to set
CLASSPATH to subdirectory
org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer in my system to
read property file?Where do i need to put  property
file ( i have put it in
org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer)and driver jar
file. Please get me back regarding this.


Thanks
Sudhindra
 

--- Michael Stack <stack@...> wrote:

> Looks like you are using java.util.ResourceBundle to
> read in the jdbc 
> properties.  Did you name your property file with
> your locale suffix 
> (.en)?  Perhaps you need to specify a path that
> points down to the 
> org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer.DBJdbc
> subdirectory?
> 
> Do you need to use java.util.ResourceBundle to read
> in a few 
> properties?  Here's an example of getting a stream
> on to a file thats on 
> the CLASSPATH:  
>
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/Heritrix.html#884.
>  
> See how we then give the stream later to java
> Properties to parse for us 
> as key/value pairs.  You could do similar.  You
> could even add your jdbc 
> properties to the end of the heritrix.properties
> file.
> 
> St.Ack
> 
> 
> Joshi Sudhindra wrote:
> >
> > Hello,
> > I have written a class to connect to Database.I
> have
> > written a parameters required for connection in
> > property file.I put them in
> > org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer
> directory.(i.e
> > package name is
> org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer).
> > When i run heritrix i am getting the error in
> > heritrix_out_log file as below:
> >
> > There is a problem with reading
> DBPathInfo.Properties
> > java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find
> bundle
> > for base name DBPathInfo, locale en
> > at
> >
>
java.util.ResourceBundle.throwMissingResourceException(ResourceBundle.java:837)
> > at
> >
>
java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundleImpl(ResourceBundle.java:806)
> > at
> >
>
java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:577)
> > at
> >
>
org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer.DBJdbc.setConnection(DBJdbc.java:40)
> > at
> >
>
org.archive.crawler.writer.my.writer.DBJdbc.<init>(DBJdbc.java:21)
> >
> > I think crawler is unable to read this propery
> file.Is
> > it problem with classpath?
> > Please do let me know where should i keep this
> > property file in heritrix.
> >
> > Note:My source is working if i compile my source
> and
> > run from terminal.
> >
> > Have a nice time
